statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_quotes WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM insurance_quotes WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM insurance_quotes WHERE risk_factor >= 3;
SELECT * FROM insurance_quotes ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM insurance_quotes WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM insurance_quotes WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT customer_name, age, risk_factor FROM insurance_quotes WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY risk_factor DESC
SELECT * FROM insurance_quotes WHERE risk_factor BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY age
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender FROM insurance_quotes WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 40
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, gender FROM insurance_quotes WHERE risk_factor > 3
SELECT * FROM insurance_customers;
SELECT name, age FROM insurance_customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, address FROM insurance_customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, risk_factor, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_data ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM insurance_customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, gender FROM insurance_customers WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM insurance_customers ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE risk_score > 80
SELECT insurance_customers.name, risk_assessment_data.risk_factor FROM insurance_customers INNER JOIN risk_assessment_data ON insurance_customers.customer_id = risk_assessment_data.customer_id
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age FROM Customers WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT quote_id, base_premium, risk_factor FROM Quotes WHERE risk_factor > 0.5;
SELECT location, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Quotes;
SELECT quote_id, customer_id, base_premium FROM Quotes ORDER BY base_premium DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;

SELECT Quotes.quote_id, Quotes.base_premium, RiskAssessmentData.location FROM Quotes JOIN RiskAssessmentData ON Quotes.quote_id = RiskAssessmentData.quote_id WHERE RiskAssessmentData.risk_score > 0.5;

SELECT Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name, Quotes.base_premium, RiskAssessmentData.risk_description FROM Customers JOIN Quotes ON Customers.customer_id = Quotes.customer_id JOIN RiskAssessmentData ON Quotes.quote_id = RiskAssessmentData.quote_id WHERE Customers.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, quoted_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN quotes ON customers.customer_id = quotes.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC, customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, gender, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;

SELECT customer_name, policy_name, coverage_amount FROM customers JOIN quotes ON customers.customer_id = quotes.customer_id JOIN insurance_policies ON quotes.policy_id = insurance_policies.policy_id WHERE quotes.quoted_amount < 500;
SELECT customers.customer_name, risk_score, assessment_date FROM customers JOIN risk_assessment ON customers.customer_id = risk_assessment.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM quotes WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE age >= 35);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers;
SELECT policy_type, coverage_amount, premium FROM policies ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM quotes WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers INNER JOIN policies ON customers.customer_id = policies.customer_id WHERE policy_type = 'Auto Insurance'
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE risk_factor_type IN ('Property', 'Personal') AND risk_factor_value > 0.5 ORDER BY risk_factor_value DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(policy_id) AS num_policies FROM policies GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_policies > 2 ORDER BY num_policies DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 10000 AND claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY claim_date ASC
